title: URBANopt District System
description: Schema for an URBANopt District System object

id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to.

source_name.description: Name of the original data source.

source_id.description: Id of the feature in original data source.

legal_name.description: Legal name used to identify this feature.

footprint_area.description: Area of the footprint (ft^2).  Calculated on export.

detailed_model_filename.description: Name of a detailed model which can be loaded from disk as a seed model or complete model. Mapper class decides which measures to disable if this is present.

weather_filename.description: Name of EPW weather file for this district system. Defaults to site's weather_filename.

tariff_filename.description: Name of the tariff file for this district system. Defaults to site's tariff_filename.

equipment.description: List of equipment in this plant. This is no longer used for Electrical workflow; use electrical_catalog_name field istead.

associated_building_id.description: ID of the building associated with the Ground-Mount PV System

electrical_catalog_name.description: Name of the equipment as specified in the OpenDSS/RNM electrical catalog (extended_catalog.json)

phases.description: Equipment Phases information. Required by the OpenDSS workflow. Example: ['A', 'B', 'C']

equipmentType.description: Type of districct energy system equipment, listed in order of load served.
